titleStmt.title: A supplement to the Bibliotecha parochialis: or, The country curates library. Being an essay towards providing all the parishes of England, endow'd with not above ten pounds per annum, with a study of useful books, to enable the ministers thereof to instruct the people in all things necessary to salvation. / By Thomas Bray, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Bray, Thomas, 1658-1730.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
